qas.question: Where did MP3s begin to spread?
Which audio player was released in 1997?
What was the name of the first portable solid state digital audio player?
In which country was the first portable audio player developed?

context: In the second half of '90s, MP3 files began to spread on <a0_0>the Internet<a0_0/>. The popularity of MP3s began to rise rapidly with the advent of <a2_0>Nullsoft<a2_0/>'s audio player <a1_0>Winamp<a1_0/>, released in 1997. In 1998, the first portable solid state digital audio player <a3_0>MPMan<a3_0/>, developed by SaeHan Information Systems which is headquartered in Seoul, <a4_0>South Korea<a4_0/>, was released and the Rio PMP300 was sold afterwards in 1998, despite legal suppression efforts by the RIAA.
